item.title: Comment on Marriage markets in everything (tax arbitrage!) by Crusader
item.description:
I’m launching a marriage-aware structured product, where you give us power of attorney to enter and exit you from marriage contracts and we automatically do so in a way that optimizes portfolio performance. Of course not for tax sake, but for love’s!
